Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeDiceValueControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can change the value of the drafted dice
    ChangeDiceValueControllerStateTest
    Test for ChangeDiceValueControllerState class
    ChangeDiceValueUnitaryControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can increment or decrement a dice value
    ChangeDiceValueUnitaryControllerStateTest
    Test for ChangeDiceValueUnitaryControllerState class
    ChooseFromTrackControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can draft a dice from the track
    ChooseFromTrackControllerStateTest
    Test for ChooseFromTrackControllerState class
    Controller
    Class that represent the Controller according the MVC paradigm.
    ControllerState
    Abstract class that represents a generic state of the Controller.
    ControllerStateManager
    Manages the creation of Controller's States
    ControllerStateManagerTest
    Test for ControllerStateManager class
    ControllerStatesSuite
    Test Suite for Controller States.
    ControllerTest
    Test for Controller class This class cannot be fully tested.
    DiceBag
    Contains all the dices that can be drafted and used.
    DiceBagTest
    Test for DiceBag class
    DraftControllerState
    This is the state during which the current player can draft a dice from draftpool.
    DraftControllerStateTest
    Test for DraftControllerState class
    EndControllerState
    This is the state during which the current player can only end the turn.
    EndControllerStateTest
    Test for EndControllerState class
    EndToolCardEffectControllerState
    This is an implicit state that ends automatically the effect of the current used toolcard.
    EnforceTrackChosenColorSimilarityControllerState
    This is an implicit state that enforces the constraint on any following die move that the dice to be moved be of the same color of the die chosen from the track.
    MoveControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can move a dice from a cell of the own windowpattern to another cell of the own windowpattern.
    MoveControllerStateTest
    Test for MoveControllerState class
    ObjectiveCardFactory
    Creates all the types of Objective Cards: PublicObjectiveCard and PrivateObjectiveCard.
    ObjectiveCardFactoryTest
    Test for ObjectiveCardFactory class
    ObjectiveCardManager
    Manages the creation and distribution of Objective Cards, ensuring that the same card can't be created more than once
    ObjectiveCardManagerTest
    Test for the ObjectiveCardManager class
    Persistency  
    PersistencyTest
    Test for Persistency class
    PlaceControllerState
    This is the state in which the current player can place a dice on the own windowPattern.
    PlaceControllerStateTest
    Test for PlaceControllerState class
    RankingRecord
    Class that represents the ranking record for a single played, including the cumulative points made, the number of lost and won games and the total time played.
    RankingRecordTest
    Test for RankingRecord class
    RerollDraftedControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can reroll drafted dice.
    RerollDraftPoolControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can reroll all dices in draftpool.
    RollOverDraftedControllerState
    This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can roll over drafted dice.
    Scorer
    Singleton class that calculates and retrieves the rankings of a given list of players and public objective cards.
    ScorerTest
    Test for Scorer Class The tests are run with RowsColumnsPublicObjectiveCardTest, DiagonalsPublicObjectiveCardTest, SetPublicObjectiveCardTest and PrivateObjectiveCardTest since the scorer uses these cards and the scores strongly depend on the scoring processo of the PublicObjectiveCard.
    SkipNextTurnControllerState
    Implicit state that as implicit behaviour removes next turn of current player.
    StartControllerState
    This is the initial state of each turn during which current player can draft a dice or use a toolcard.
    StartControllerStateTest
    Test for StartControllerState class
    SwapDraftedWithTrackControllerState
    This is an implicit state that switch drafted dice with selected dice from track.
    SwitchDraftedWithBagControllerState
    This is an implicit state that switches drafted dice with one random drafted from dicebag.
    ToolCardControllerState
    This is the state in which current player can use a toolcard.
    ToolCardControllerStateTest
    Test for ToolCardControllerState class
    ToolCardManager
    Manages creation and distribution of Tool Cards
    ToolCardManagerTest
    Test for ToolCardManager classD
    WindowPatternManager
    Manages the loading and creation of WindowPattern
    WindowPatternManagerTest
    Test for WindowPatternManager class
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadFormattedPatternFileException
    The class BadFormattedPatternFileException is a form of Exception that is used to notify that an .xml file representing a pattern is bad formatted and due to this can't be correctly processed.
    BadFormattedToolCardFileException
    The class BadFormattedToolCardFileException is a form of Exception that is used to notify that an .xml file representing a toolCard is bad formatted and due to this can't be correctly processed.
    NoMoreRoundsAvailableException
    The class NoMoreRoundsAvailableException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no more rounds are available.
    NoMoreTurnsAvailableException
    The class NoMoreTurnsAvailableException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no more turns are available.
    NoPatternsFoundInFileSystemException
    The class NoPatternsFoundInFileSystemException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no patterns files were found in the file system inspection.
    NoToolCardsFoundInFileSystemException
    The class NoToolCardsFoundInFileSystemException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no toolCards files were found in the file system inspection.
